_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.4^speaker: People who were walking about the dwellings
pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.10^speaker: Monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:1.14^where_before_or_a: the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood near Vesālī
pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.14^where_before_or_a: The hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood near Vesālī
pli-tv-bu-vb-np12:2.14^who_present_befor: Monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-np12^where: the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood near Vesālī
